name: TolaData
tagline: TolaData build and supports tools for evidence based data collection and management.
body:
## Welcome to TolaData.
The goal of Tola is to support adaptive program management and enable experienced-based learning by providing tools that can improve the quality of NGO programs and M&E data.

Tola currently has two primary components that can be adapted for each country context and need:
### Tola Tables
Allows users to connect digital data collection tools (such as ODK/Ona, iFormBuilder, etc) as well as Excel or other formats directly to indicators and projects in the system.
### Tola Activity
A set of standard forms, dashboard and approval process that help support adaptive management within an organization.  Also includes a detailed Indicator Tracker, providing teams with a way to track all program indicators and their targets vs. actuals.

### Benefits
Evidence and data is used to inform management and decision-making at multiple levels, but primarily focusing on Program managers and staff while simultaneously providing high level reports and dashboard for senior levels within an organization.
* System meets field team requirements for basic data management and traceability and facilitates quality reporting
* System increases efficiency of field teams and reduces wasted money spent on single program solutions
* System incorporates the requirements for standard indicators from the Design for Impact Guide (DIG) to enhance program development and design, and improve measurement practice
* Enables access to share the results of programs with key stakeholders through various points of analysis (such as country, regional, sectoral, response/initiative, etc)
* System integrates with existing tools allowing for ease of use and future maintenance


### Support or Contact
Support requests go to http://tola.work
